item.title: Powering AI Innovation with Splunk: Meet the Cisco Data Fabric
item.description: The Cisco Data Fabric brings AI-centric advancements to the Splunk Platform, seamlessly connecting knowledge, business, and machine data.

item.title: The Ultimate Kubernetes Cheat Sheet: Essential kubectl Commands for 2025
item.description: Level up your kubectl skills with this ultimate Kubernetes cheat sheet — essential commands, examples, and tips for deploying, debugging, and scaling clusters.

item.description: At .conf25, we unveiled new capabilities in Splunk Observability Cloud that redefine digital resilience in the AI era with smarter detection and investigation of business-critical issues.

item.description: Announcing a transformative update to Splunk Enterprise Security (ES) with 8.2: An AI-powered SecOps platform designed to unify and accelerate threat detection, investigation, and response (TDIR) in one seamless experience.

item.title: Strengthen SOC Defenses with Native UEBA in Splunk Enterprise Security
item.description: Splunk's enhanced UEBA capability, now natively available in ES, empowers SOCs to transition from reactive, fragmented workflows to a proactive, behavior-driven security posture.
